section.whatIsRalph.title: What is the Ralph Wiggum Loop?
section.whatIsRalph.description: The Ralph methodology (coined by Geoffrey Huntley) is a development approach where an AI agent receives the same prompt repeatedly until it completes a task. Each iteration, the AI sees its previous work in files and git history, creating a self-correction feedback loop.
section.whatIsRalph.benefit1.title: Self-Correction
section.whatIsRalph.benefit1.desc: AI sees test failures from previous runs and fixes them
section.whatIsRalph.benefit2.title: Persistence
section.whatIsRalph.benefit2.desc: Walk away, come back to completed work
section.whatIsRalph.benefit3.title: Iteration
section.whatIsRalph.benefit3.desc: Complex tasks broken into incremental progress
section.whatIsOpenSpec.title: What is OpenSpec?
section.whatIsOpenSpec.description: OpenSpec is spec-driven development (SDD) for AI coding assistants. It brings structure to AI coding by requiring specs before code.
section.whatIsOpenSpec.feature1.title: Specs Before Code
section.whatIsOpenSpec.feature1.desc: Agree on what to build before implementation
section.whatIsOpenSpec.feature2.title: Structured Changes
section.whatIsOpenSpec.feature3.title: Acceptance Criteria
section.whyRalphySpec.title: Why Ralphy-Spec?
section.whyRalphySpec.description: AI coding assistants are powerful but unpredictable. Ralphy-Spec solves this by combining the best of both worlds.
section.whyRalphySpec.solution1: OpenSpec locks intent in structured specs
section.whyRalphySpec.problem2: AI stops mid-task or makes mistakes
section.whyRalphySpec.solution4: One command sets up Cursor, OpenCode, Claude Code
section.platforms.title: Supported Platforms
section.platforms.description: Ralphy-Spec works with your favorite AI coding tools.

section.credits.ralph.title: Ralph Wiggum Methodology
section.credits.ralph.desc: Conceived by Geoffrey Huntley. The insight that AI agents can self-correct through iteration changed how we think about AI-assisted development.

section.credits.openspec.desc: by Fission-AI - The spec-driven development framework that brings structure and predictability to AI coding.
section.credits.thanks: We are grateful to these projects and their maintainers for pioneering these approaches.
